dcterms:description: The DRISHTI-GS dataset consists of 101 fundus images with a resolution of 2896 Ã— 1944 pixels. It comprises both Normal and Glaucomatous images along with their ground truths. This dataset has been collected and annotated by Aravind Eye Hospital, Madurai, India, in collaboration with researchers of IIIT Hyderabad.
